attributes.action: discourage TV editors from using background music in documentaries and factual programmes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Research shows that a significant minority of hearing impaired people (mainly elderly) find it difficult and often impossible to understand speech against background noise/music and are thus denied the full use of TV available to other license payers with normal hearing.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "discourage TV editors from using background music in documentaries and factual programmes."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14966.asp
